entry.sentence: The canister , light in itself , and the rifle that hung from a strap over his shoulder seemed to grow heavier with each passing minute .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (DT The) (NN canister)) (, ,) (NP (NP (NP (NN light)) (PP (IN in) (NP (PRP itself)))) (, ,) (CC and) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN rifle)) (SBAR (WHNP (WDT that)) (S (VP (VBN hung) (PP (IN from) (NP (NP (DT a) (NN strap)) (PP (IN over) (NP (PRP$ his) (NN shoulder))))))))))) (VP (VBD seemed) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB grow) (ADVP (RBR heavier)) (PP (IN with) (NP (DT each) (VBG passing) (NN minute))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(canister-2, The-1) nsubj(seemed-19, canister-2) xsubj(grow-21, canister-2) appos(canister-2, light-4) prep_in(light-4, itself-6) det(rifle-10, the-9) appos(canister-2, rifle-10) conj_and(light-4, rifle-10) nsubj(hung-12, rifle-10) rcmod(rifle-10, hung-12) det(strap-15, a-14) prep_from(hung-12, strap-15) poss(shoulder-18, his-17) prep_over(strap-15, shoulder-18) root(ROOT-0, seemed-19) aux(grow-21, to-20) xcomp(seemed-19, grow-21) advmod(grow-21, heavier-22) det(minute-26, each-24) amod(minute-26, passing-25) prep_with(grow-21, minute-26)

entry.sentence: Now it was taking its revenge that Corman had not exercised at all in the past few years .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (ADVP (RB Now)) (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBD was) (VP (VBG taking) (NP (PRP$ its) (NN revenge)) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (NNP Corman)) (VP (VBD had) (RB not) (VP (VBN exercised) (ADVP (IN at) (DT all)) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT the) (JJ past) (JJ few) (NNS years))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: advmod(taking-4, Now-1) nsubj(taking-4, it-2) aux(taking-4, was-3) root(ROOT-0, taking-4) poss(revenge-6, its-5) dobj(taking-4, revenge-6) mark(exercised-11, that-7) nsubj(exercised-11, Corman-8) aux(exercised-11, had-9) neg(exercised-11, not-10) ccomp(taking-4, exercised-11) advmod(exercised-11, at-12) pobj(at-12, all-13) det(years-18, the-15) amod(years-18, past-16) amod(years-18, few-17) prep_in(exercised-11, years-18)

entry.sentence: He was in miserable physical condition , no longer used to any kind of exertion .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP He)) (VP (VBD was) (PP (IN in) (NP (ADJP (JJ miserable) (NN physical)) (NN condition))) (, ,) (ADVP (RB no) (RB longer)) (VP (VBN used) (PP (TO to) (NP (NP (DT any) (NN kind)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN exertion))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubjpass(used-10, He-1) auxpass(used-10, was-2) dep(physical-5, miserable-4) amod(condition-6, physical-5) prep_in(used-10, condition-6) advmod(longer-9, no-8) advmod(used-10, longer-9) root(ROOT-0, used-10) det(kind-13, any-12) prep_to(used-10, kind-13) prep_of(kind-13, exertion-15)

entry.sentence: Several times he asked for a break , but Richards categorically refused , saying it was too dangerous .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (S (NP (JJ Several) (NNS times)) (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD asked) (PP (IN for) (NP (DT a) (NN break))))) (, ,) (CC but) (S (NP (NNP Richards)) (ADVP (RB categorically)) (VP (VBD refused) (, ,) (S (VP (VBG saying) (SBAR (S (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBD was) (ADJP (RB too) (JJ dangerous))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: amod(times-2, Several-1) nsubj(asked-4, times-2) nsubj(asked-4, he-3) root(ROOT-0, asked-4) det(break-7, a-6) prep_for(asked-4, break-7) nsubj(refused-12, Richards-10) advmod(refused-12, categorically-11) conj_but(asked-4, refused-12) xcomp(refused-12, saying-14) nsubj(dangerous-18, it-15) cop(dangerous-18, was-16) advmod(dangerous-18, too-17) ccomp(saying-14, dangerous-18)
